title: Are You Not Trendertained? 2/22: Mike Lindell, Daft Punk, Merrick Garland, 76ers, Coca-Cola
itunes:title: Are You Not Trendertained? 2/22: Mike Lindell, Daft Punk, Merrick Garland, 76ers, Coca-Cola
description:
On this edition of Are You Not Trendertained Jack and Miles discuss My Pillow CEO Mike Lindell being sued for $1.3B, Daft Punk are retiring after 28 years, Merrick Garland is Biden's pick for AG, the Sixers are playing well (and other NBA talk), and Coke is showing off a new paper bottle.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
